name: Christina Tasiou
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Children and Family, Coach Promotion, Content Creation, Course Creation Training, Financial Coaches, Intuition Coaching, Podcast Services, Public Speaking, Webinar Training
what_you_do: Writer and women's leadership coach offering bespoke, high-touch, one-on-one coaching containers for ambitious, heart-led women to translate their innate feminine power into actionable results.
who_you_serve: Ambitious, heart-led women including founders, business professionals, and creatives who believe in a world where all women are empowered and honored.
social_proof: Certified Integrative Transformational Coach, licensed CPA, over a decade of executive experience including roles at Deloitte, Disney, and leading startups in Silicon Valley, advocacy work impacting global companies like Meta, Pinterest, Snap Inc., and Shopify.
business_focus: Empowering ambitious women through one-on-one coaching and a members-only community that connects and develops conscious feminine leaders.
service_provided: One-on-one coaching, members-only community, leadership development, well-being resources, self-reflection tools, virtual and in-person events, menstrual cycle awareness advocacy in corporate spaces
